metadata.synopsis: AD from Oliver if players chase him to the TWN Center for the climax of Lifting the Curse
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug Book > quest flags and options > Act 2 > GLO - Lifting the Curse > Halsin and Spirit at Camp.Then teleport to Olivers House, spam 1 til he runs away. Click the portal to follow him. When you arrive at the other end of the teleporter, he should play the AD.

1.speaker: Oliver
1.text: You should have just left me alone!

0.speaker: Oliver
0.text: Spoil my fun? I'll teach you a lesson - just you watch.
